meanings.definition: Of or relating to the scrotum.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined the scrotal area for any abnormalities.
meanings.sent2: The scrotal skin is sensitive and requires proper care.
meanings.sent3: The scrotal support garment was surprisingly comfortable.
meanings.sent4: His scrotal shape was compared to a small pouch holding precious cargo.
meanings.sent5: The scrotal swelling indicated a potential medical issue.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a scrotum.
meanings.sent1: The fruit's scrotal appearance made it unappealing to some customers.
meanings.sent2: The scrotal texture of the fabric was intentional for added grip.
meanings.sent3: The scrotal design on the bag was a bold fashion statement.
meanings.sent4: The scrotal shape of the balloon animal was oddly realistic.
meanings.sent5: The scrotal resemblance of the rock formation was uncanny.
